greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Shift one instance of the largest prime one step towards larger primes: a(1) = 1, for n>1: a(n) = (n / prime(g)) * prime(g+1), where g = A061395(n), index of the greatest prime dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: A252462(a(n)) = n. [A252462 works as an inverse function for this injection.]
xref: Cf. A102750 (same terms, but with 2 instead of 1, sorted into ascending order).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 03 2015
